name: To the Bottom (Rocket135)
description:
Thanks for playing To the Bottom!

Controls:

wasd: Movement
Hold Left Click: Mine + Attack
1: Equip Pickaxe
2: Equip Sword
Space: Jump Jumping while having your cursor on a wall will allow you to climb

Killing critters will give you wood needed to craft better tools and make it to the bottom to win! Let us know if you find any bugs and we will attempt to fix them.

Made with i-Frame and [Insert_Username_ere]
